metadata.title: USN-4553-1 -- Teeworlds vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Teeworlds server did not properly handler certain network traffic. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could use this vulnerability to cause Teeworlds server to crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4553-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  teeworlds - 0.7.2-5ubuntu1.1 teeworlds-server - 0.7.2-5ubuntu1.1 teeworlds-data - 0.7.2-5ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
